comment.author: Kc
comment.text: She didn't do anything to Bernie you morons!! Bernie is a democrat and he would never vote republican! So if you vote Republican, you go against everything he stands for.

replies.author: Lindsey
replies.text: Hillary lacks.... Morals: a person's standards of behavior or beliefs concerning what is and is not acceptable for them to do................ Values: a person's principles or standards of behavior; one's judgment of what is important in life................. Virtues: behavior showing high moral standards.............. SO how can anyone support her?!? How disappointing and sad because many of you are parents!!
